text: Walter Pirinoli (born 26 August 1963) is an Italian former yacht racer who competed in the 1996 Summer Olympics. His brother was also a sailor, Marco Pirinoli. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Italy Category:Sailors at the 1996 Summer Olympics – Tornado Category:Tornado class world champions Category:World champions in sailing for Italy
title: Walter Pirinoli
